title: JAM Session _1594 Credit Hours Update Requirement Gathering.pdf

pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Presented by Debbie Parrish, EX Product Manager – Enrollment Management  Jenzabar  June 3, 2016  #1584 – Credit Hours Update Requirement Gathering © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Purpose  This session will be a listening session and is the opportunity for you to tell us how Jenzabar can further improve on how EX calculates enrollment for Financial Aid and get it timely communicated to PowerFAIDS.  FEEDBACK NEEDED: If you did not attend JAM or did and downloaded this session, please consider all the THINK slides and email Debbie Parrish ( debbie.parrish@Jenzabar.com ) with any comments, special needs you and your school have concerning Credit Hours Update. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Think     Only one POE can be selected     Can’t process single student     Process takes too long!     No Progress Bar to indicate process is still running     Ineligible hour counts do not list specific course(s)     POE Load Status does not include “NOT ENROLLED” status     Year Hrs Enrolled includes all RE terms for RE YEAR of selected POE     Previous Hrs based on last run...not what exists in PowerFAIDS     Developmental Hours limit not configurable for Quarter/Clock hour schools     No support for Clock hour schools     Must use Create Student Update to transfer Hours     No CENSUS Date cutoff © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Optionally calculate Census Date and Post Census Date hours     Optionally calculate Sub-Term hours and display these hours     Show all POEs for student     Include attendance hours  Think some more © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Include Enrolled Hours on both reports     Identify students with NO Student Master records (aka a candidate)     Include Non-Degree Seeking  Keep Thinking © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Allow for sub-term mapping to POE     Allow for EX to add POEs for student in PowerFAIDS  Don’t Stop Thinking © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1 - 4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Thank you!  Please take time to fill out the survey for session   1584-Credit Hours Update Requirement Gathering :  https://www.jenzabarevents.com/jam/post_conference_eval.cfm  Evaluation
